DummyVolumes._comment: Specify DummyVolumes (number of dummy scans) for each task or task/run combination

_description.DummyVolumes: Map of task-specific dummy volumes. Keys should match BIDS naming: 'task-<taskname>' or 'task-<taskname>_run-<runnum>'. StartTime will be calculated as: -(30s + TR Ã— DummyVolumes)
